overview: The Walt Disney World Celebrity Circus originally aired November 27, 1987.  Join Mickey Mouse, Malcolm Jamal Warner, Lisa Bonet, Tony Randall, Kim Fields, Tim Conway, and Jim “Earnest” Varney along with 500 Clowns, lions and elephants for this once in a lifetime event.  EPCOT Centers World Showcase plays host for the breathtaking performances.
title: Walt Disney World Celebrity Circus
